constituent: pay respects, person, director, Ken Russel, clothes hanger, coat hanger, one, mouth
heisigStory: This honorific form of call on (Frame 534) is made up of: person . . . director.
koohiiStory1: That person, being the director, is someone you need to pay your respects to.
koohiiStory2: If Mr. T gets a role in a film, he doesnt pay respects to the director, the director pays respects to Mr. T.
words: 伺う(うかがう): (polite) visit, ask, inquire, hear, be told, implore (a god for an oracle)
